Keyboard shortcuts for Webflow

A visual cheat-sheet for the 41 keyboard shortcuts found in Webflow

Original Reference Report Issue

General

Show shortcut cheatsheet

  • Shift
  • /

Save as a snapshot

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • S

Deselect or abort

  • Esc

Delete element

  • Del

Show publish dialog

  • Shift
  • P

Show export code dialog

  • Shift
  • E

Edit element

  • Enter

View

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • P

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • G

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • E

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • X

Left-hand Toolbar

Show add panel

  • A

Show navigator tab

  • Z

Show pages panel

  • P

Show symbols panel

  • Shift
  • A

Make selected element a symbol

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • A

Show asset manager

  • J

Show style tab

  • S

Show settings tab

  • D

Show style manager tab

  • G

  • H

  • (drag)

  • Alt
  • (drag)

  • Enter

  • (click)
